column1: #text=I turned on the cold and hot taps to let the bathtub fill with warm water .
#text=Then I got a towel and draped it over the curtain rod .
#text=I took off my clothes and grabbed my favorite rubber ducky from a shelf .
#text=If I needed a bath , so did he .
#text=I also poured some bubble bath into the tub as it was filling with water .
#text=It foamed up into lots of bubbles .
#text=When the tub was full enough , I turned off the water and got into the tub , being careful not to slip on the slippery porcelain .
#text=I lay back in the warm water and shut my eyes , relaxing .
#text=When the water started to get cold , I stood up and grabbed the towel from the curtain rod .
#text=I draped it around myself and then opened the tub 's drain so the water could drain out .
#text=I went off to get dressed , and when I was done I went back to the bathroom and turned the shower on for a minute so the bubbles would all go down the drain .
#text=I picked up my rubber ducky and gave him a squeeze until he quacked .
#text=Then I put him on the shelf until next time .
